entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump We have over 52+ million unemployed & over 127,000 dead Americans due to your criminally negligent response to #COVID19 & this is what you’re rambling about? What are you going to do about Russia paying bounties to terrorists to kill US troops? You’re going to prison, traitor.
